headline: Mondelēz CTO, CISO to depart
summary: Kostas Georgakopoulos’ last day at the snack food giant will be Thursday. Two executives have been tapped to take over the roles on an interim basis.

headline: Mondelez International (MDLZ): A Strong Contender Among Food Dividend Stocks
summary: Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) is included among the 10 Best Food Stocks with Dividends. Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ), a major name in the snack food industry, is well known for owning popular chocolate brands like Oreo, Cadbury, Chips Ahoy!, Milka, and others. As of 2025, it held the second-largest share in the global chocolate market […]

headline: Mondelez (MDLZ) Q2 Earnings: What To Expect
summary: Packaged snacks company Mondelez (NASDAQ:MDLZ) will be reporting results this Tuesday afternoon. Here’s what to expect.
